config.label: Content Type
config.name: contentType
config.helpText: Choose the type of content that will be displayed in the component. This will cause all contents of the selected type to be loaded, filtering and limiting them to the parameters set in this configuration.

config.label: Activar Pagination
config.name: pagination
config.helpText: If activated, pagination will be displayed at the bottom of the list.

config.label: Ordenar por
config.name: order
config.helpText: Choose the order in which the contents should appear.

config.label: Initial Page
config.name: initial_page
config.helpText: You can choose if by default the first page of the contents is displayed or if you want to show some other as the initial page.

config.label: Items per page
config.name: items_per_page
config.helpText: Number of items you want to display per page or limit of items to display.

config.label: Rel
config.name: rel
config.helpText: Define a custom context for the filters applied to the list.

config.label: URL Content Detail
config.name: url_detail
config.helpText: URL where the full detail of the content will be displayed. This URL must be previously created and configured to display that content. Receive idContent in the URL as the content ID.

config.label: Custom Template Code(HTML + JSRender)(Opcional)
config.name: template_code
config.helpText: If you prefer to customize the template that shows the list of content you can do it through this field. Use JSRender and HTML for it. Remember that the data is received in a variable 'data'
